Caches shader uniforms, reducing the number of times they are invoked. (Requires resource reload)
palladium.config.shaderi.tooltip: Caching shaderi - shader integers, reducing the number of times they are invoked. (Requires resource reload)
palladium.config.shaderiLog.tooltip: Caching shaderiLog - shader integer log, reducing the number of times they are invoked. (Requires resource reload)
palladium.config.data_fix.tooltip:
Data fixers are involved in transferring worlds from one version to another. 
Enabling this speed up game loading. 
Before updating the game to a new version, it is recommended to disable this option(Requires resource reload)
palladium.config.resource_key_deduplicat: Deletes duplicates of resource key. (Requires resource reload)
palladium.config.resource_location_dedup: Deletes duplicates of chosen resource location. (Requires resource reload)
palladium.config.lightweight_attack_ai.t: Optimizes target finding of cat and wolf (Requires world restart)
palladium.config.lightweight_flee_ai.too: Optimizes position finding for flee goals of wolf and rabbit (Requires world restart)
